title: Find Your Perfect Security Camera
description: Let us help you choose the right security camera for your home

questions.question: Where do you want to place your cameras?
How do you prefer to power your cameras?

options.text: Battery-powered - no wires or outlets needed
Plugged in - reliable power, no battery changes

questions.question: How do you want to store your recorded videos?

options.text: Cloud storage - videos saved online, accessible anywhere
Local storage - videos saved on a memory card or device

questions.question: Are you willing to pay a monthly subscription for extra features?

options.text: No - I want no monthly fees
Yes - I want the best features

questions.question: What features are most important to you?

options.text: Best video quality - see every detail
Great night vision - see clearly in the dark
Smart features - person detection, alerts, etc.
Easy to set up and use

no-subscription.title: No Subscription Security Cameras
reasons: These cameras have no monthly fees - all features included
Local storage on SD card means your videos stay private

products.name: Wyze Cam v4
specs: 2.5K video quality - very sharp and clear
Color night vision - see in full color at night
Local storage on SD card (up to 512GB)
Two-way audio to speak through the camera
products.why: The Wyze Cam v4 is the best value in security cameras. You get amazing 2.5K video quality, color night vision, and smart detection features with no monthly fees required. Local storage on an SD card means your videos stay private. Perfect for anyone who wants professional features without subscriptions.

products.name: Eufy Indoor Cam C120
specs: Pan and tilt - move camera remotely
Local storage on SD card (up to 128GB)
products.why: Eufy cameras never require subscriptions. The C120 has pan and tilt, so you can move the camera view from your phone. Great for keeping an eye on a whole room without multiple cameras.

products.name: Eufy SoloCam S340 (Outdoor Solar)
specs: Completely wireless with built-in solar panel
8GB built-in storage - no SD card needed
Dual cameras for wide and close-up views
products.why: This camera charges itself with sunlight, so you never need to plug it in or change batteries. Built-in storage means no SD cards to manage. Perfect for outdoor spots far from outlets.

budget.title: Budget-Friendly Security Cameras
reasons: Excellent value - great features at an affordable price

products.name: Wyze Cam v4
products.why: Under $40 and packed with features that cost much more on other cameras. The 2.5K video is incredibly sharp, and color night vision helps you see details at night. Best budget camera available.

products.name: Blink Outdoor 4
products.why: Blink cameras have the longest battery life - up to 2 years on just two AA batteries! Completely wireless so you can mount them anywhere. Great for outdoor spots without power outlets.

products.name: Blink Mini 2
features: Color night vision with built-in spotlight
products.why: The most affordable camera that works both indoors and outdoors. Tiny size makes it easy to place anywhere. The built-in spotlight helps with night vision.

mid-range.title: Mid-Range Security Cameras
reasons: Perfect balance of features and affordability

products.name: Eufy Indoor Cam E30
products.why: 4K video means you can zoom in and still see clearly. Auto-tracking follows people as they move. No monthly fees required, but cloud storage available if wanted.

products.name: TP-Link Tapo C120
products.why: Great mid-range indoor camera with a privacy shutter you can close when home. Local storage means no monthly fees. Very reliable.

premium.title: Premium Security Cameras
reasons: Top-tier video quality and advanced features

products.name: Arlo Pro 5S 2K
features: Works with everything: HomeKit, Alexa, Google
products.why: Arlo Pro 5S is the pinnacle of battery-powered cameras. The 2K HDR video is professional grade, and the wide view sees more of your yard. It's the most polished, premium experience available.
